Constructor Detail

BoardGUI

public BoardGUI(Board BP,
                Player P1,
                Player P2,
                Pack_of_cards PoC)
Constructor: Constructs a new Board frame and puts all the necessary Panels
post-condition: Creates and initializes a Board frame and puts in specific order all the Panels (background,logo,board,Player1,infobox,Player2) and all the Labels,images and text that go above them.

Parameters:
BP - The Board data
P1 - The first Player
P2 - The second Player
PoC - The Pack of Cards
Method Detail

pawnmove

public void pawnmove(Player P1)
accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player in relation with his dice
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player according with his dice

Parameters:
P1 - The Player that his pawn moves

pawnreset

public void pawnreset(Player P1)
accessor(selector): Moves the pawn of the Player to the Start Position
post-condition: Changes the coordinates of the pawn of the Player and sends it to the Start of the Board

Parameters:
P1 - The Player that his pawn moves
